Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line Delays trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Dempster-Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line Delays trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Dempster-Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Ebehert
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, and 79th due to, street blockage at 79th/Ebehert.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, and 79th due to, street blockage at 79th/Ebehert.

Allow extra travel time.
